title: Watch: Trialling Landscape Recovery agreements in Ashdown Forest
categories: Payments to restore landscapes and ecosystems

content.text: Landscape Recovery is one of our environmental land management schemes.
It's for landowners and managers who want to take a more radical and large-scale approach to producing environmental and climate goods on their land.
In this film, farmers who took part in the Ashdown Forest test and trial share their experiences developing a draft Landscape Recovery agreement for the area.
Securing agreements with a variety of stakeholders will help to achieve the group's ambition of being bigger, better and more joined up.
Thanks to James, Nic, Harrison and Elizabeth for taking part in this film.
